Description: Block diagram showing: 04_DESIGN → TRADE_STUDIES → CALCULATIONS/SIMULATIONS → ANALYSIS_REPORTS → CERTIFICATION. Include data flow arrows and feedback loops.
Tree-style diagram of 06_ENGINEERING showing main folders (ANALYSIS_REPORTS / CALCULATIONS / SIMULATIONS / TECHNICAL_NOTES / TRADE_STUDIES) with role assignments for each domain.
Heatmap showing standards (CS-25, MIL-HDBK, etc.) vs domains (STRUCTURAL/AERO/WB/CLEARANCE/PERF/CERT). Color-code: Green=Full coverage, Yellow=Partial, Red=Gap, Gray=N/A.
3D visualization of global FEM model showing mesh density, element types, and boundary conditions. Highlight critical load paths.
Bar chart showing all 25+ CS-25 load cases organized by category (Maneuver/Gust/Landing/Pressure). Include load factors and speeds.
Detailed cross-sections at root, mid-span, and tip showing spar caps, stringers, skin thickness, and material types.
Contour plot of von Mises stress on wing box upper and lower surfaces at 2.5g pull-up condition. Highlight critical zones.
Cross-section of center body showing pressure vessel geometry, equivalent cylindrical radius, frame spacing, and stringer layout.
Contour plot of hoop stress in center body skin at max cabin pressure (8.0 psi differential). Include stress concentration at door cutouts.
Bar chart comparing vertical, forward, and lateral loads for all landing conditions (LC-LDG-01 through LC-LDG-05). Include limit and ultimate loads.
S-N curves for primary materials (7075-T6, Ti-6Al-4V, IM7/8552) showing stress vs cycles to failure. Include design life markers.
Plot of crack length vs flight cycles for critical locations (wing lower skin, center body door frame, gear trunnion). Show inspection intervals.
3D view of CFD computational domain showing aircraft surface mesh, boundary layer prism layers, and far-field boundaries.
Cp contour plot on upper and lower surfaces at cruise (M0.82, FL410). Highlight shock wave location on upper surface.
Streamline visualization showing flow around BWB configuration. Include velocity magnitude contours and wake development.
Plot of local CL and section lift (kN/m) vs spanwise station (y/b ratio). Compare cruise, take-off, and landing configurations.
Pie chart showing drag components: Induced, Friction (wing/body/nacelle), Form, Wave, Interference, Miscellaneous. Label with drag counts.
Plot of CD vs CL showing drag polar curve. Indicate cruise point (CL=0.52, CD<0.022) and L/D=23.6 line.
Side-by-side comparison of take-off (flaps 20°, slats 25°) and landing (flaps 30°, slats 30°) configurations with deflection angles labeled.
Plot of CL vs angle of attack for clean, take-off, and landing configurations. Mark CLmax values and stall angles.
Velocity-damping-frequency (V-g) diagram showing critical modes (1st wing bending, 1st torsion, aileron). Include flutter boundary and VD/VF markers.
Plot of CG location (% MAC) vs aircraft weight (kg). Show forward/aft limits, and CG positions for OEW, MZFW, MTOW, MLW. Include fuel burn trajectory.
Bar chart showing weight breakdown by ATA chapter (21-Air Conditioning, 27-Flight Controls, 28-Fuel System, 32-Landing Gear, 51-Wing Structure, etc.).
3D visualization of mass moment of inertia ellipsoid showing principal axes (roll Ixx, pitch Iyy, yaw Izz) for MTOW configuration.
Side view showing aircraft in static level, tail-down, and rotation attitudes. Label belly clearance, wingtip clearance, tail clearance with dimensions.
Plot of ground clearance (m) vs pitch attitude (degrees) for belly, wingtip, and tail. Show minimum required clearances and margins.
Multi-frame sequence showing landing gear retraction kinematics: doors open → gear retracts → gear stowed → doors close. Label timestamps.
Top view showing aircraft turning paths with nose wheel steering at ±70°. Label minimum turning radius (inside/outside main gear, wingtip).
Time-series plot showing vertical CG position, pitch angle, and gear stroke during landing impact (0-2 seconds). Highlight max compression and rebound.
Plot of payload (kg) vs range (km) showing design point (40,000 kg / 8,000 km), max structural payload, and ferry range. Include fuel capacity constraint line.
Altitude vs distance plot showing mission segments: taxi, take-off, climb, cruise, descent, landing. Label fuel burn per segment.
Stacked bar chart showing take-off distance components: ground roll (brake to VR), rotation (VR to VLOF), airborne (VLOF to 35 ft). Total <3,000 m.
Speed tape showing VS, V1, VR, VLOF, V2 with values in KIAS. Include safety margins and regulatory requirements.
Stacked bar chart showing landing distance: air distance (50 ft to touchdown), flare, free roll (3 sec), braking. Total <2,500 m.
Plot of altitude (ft) vs time (min) showing climb from sea level to FL410. Include speed schedule (250 KIAS / 280 KIAS / M0.78) transitions.
Plot of rate of climb (ft/min) vs altitude (ft) for MTOW and MLW. Show service ceiling and OEI climb capability.
Gantt chart or progress bar showing CS-25 compliance status by subpart (C-Structure, D-Design, F-Equipment, etc.). Color-code: Green=Complete, Yellow=In-Work, Red=Not Started.
Flowchart showing structural substantiation process: Design → Analysis → Test → Compliance Statement. Include decision points and feedback loops.
Fault tree analysis diagram for 'Wing Structural Failure' showing AND/OR gates, basic events (pilot error, manufacturing defect, fatigue crack), and probability calculations.
Side-by-side comparison of 4 gear height options (A: 2.8m, B: 3.0m, C: 3.2m ✓, D: 3.5m) showing belly clearance and tail-down angle.
Spider/radar chart showing 4 evaluation criteria (Ground Clearance, Weight, Integration, Operational) with scores for each option. Highlight selected option C.
Top view showing 4 wing planform options with sweep and AR variations. Label wingspan, AR, and predicted L/D for each.
Scatter plot showing L/D vs aspect ratio with wing weight contours. Highlight Pareto frontier and selected design point (AR=3.2, L/D=23.6).
Cross-sections of 4 center body depth options (3.8m, 4.0m, 4.2m ✓, 4.5m) showing cabin height, cargo volume, and structural mass.
Plan view showing 3 tank layout options: A) 2 large center body, B) 4 medium distributed ✓, C) 6 small distributed. Label capacity and CG shift.
Matrix showing leading edge (Fixed, Krueger, Slat) vs trailing edge (Plain, Single-slot, Double-slot ✓) combinations with CLmax increments.
Aircraft diagram showing positive directions for X (forward), Y (right), Z (up) axes and positive rotations (pitch up, roll right, yaw right).
Multi-panel diagram showing: 1) Body-fixed axes, 2) Wind axes, 3) Stability axes, 4) Earth-fixed NED. Include transformation relationships.
Side view showing fuselage stations (FS 0.0 nose to FS 52.5 tail), waterlines (WL 0.0 to 4.2), and buttlines (BL 0.0 centerline to ±26 m tip).
Flight envelope diagram showing positive (+2.5g) and negative (-1.0g) limit load factors vs speed (VS, VA, VC, VD). Include gust load lines.
Bar chart comparing key properties (density, E-modulus, yield strength, ultimate strength) for 7075-T6, Ti-6Al-4V, IM7/8552 composite.
Flowchart showing V&V process: Model Development → Verification (mesh convergence, hand calc) → Validation (test correlation) → Acceptance → Release.
